taskTitle: E2E: Add headed mode option to see tests run visually

subtasks.description:
Implement: E2E: Add headed mode option to see tests run visually

Add option to run Playwright tests in headed (non-headless) mode so users can watch the browser during test execution. Should support: 1) CLI flag like 'bun run e2e:test:headed' or '--headed', 2) Slow-mo option to see interactions step-by-step, 3) Debug mode with Playwright inspector. Update package.json with convenience scripts. Covers developer experience for debugging E2E tests.
